Description:
PERFECT STARTER IN ARCADIA!
We are proud to present this beautifully designed three-bedroom home featuring a family friendly floorplan. It will be sure to tick all the boxes if you are looking for your first home, investment or downsizing.
Offering three spacious bedrooms, master suite with walk in robe and ensuite and additional bedrooms with built in robes serviced by the central bathroom and separate toilet.
The kitchen is sure to impress with stainless steel appliances, ample cupboard storage and bench space while overlooking the open plan living area and an additional formal lounge and rumpus room for the family to enjoy.
Outside you are greeted by the low maintenance yard and the undercover pergola deck for all your entertaining needs and your family to enjoy all on a 451sqm (approx.) allotment.
Impressive extras include ducted heating, remote control double garage with internal access and established gardens.
Situated in the highly sought-after Arcadia estate, minutes to Officer Secondary College, St Francis Xavier College, Bridgewood primary school, park, train stations, public transport, freeways and local shopping centres and all amenities are at your fingertips.

Description:
When Convenience Matters!
Proudly presenting is this impressive JG King contemporary home situated in one of Officer's most desirable locations. This neat and tidy townhouse is perfect for first home buyers, investors or anyone looking to downsize. It certainly will capture the eye and allow for maximum comfort with minimal maintenance.
As you step inside the entrance and down the hallway it will lead you through to the main living zone where the open plan kitchen, dining & living room awaits, embraced with natural light throughout. The kitchen is sure to impress the chef of the house hold, offering stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, cupboard storage and pantry. Sliding doors open out to your own low maintenance courtyard where you can relax and enjoy the sunshine in private.
The home itself features three good sized bedrooms, the master suite with ensuite and built in robe, the remaining bedrooms both offer built in robes, conveniently positioned centrally to the main bathroom and toilet.
Additional extras include; split system heating and cooling, electric heating in the bedrooms and a double remote garage with the laundry located outside in the garage.
If low maintenance living is what you're looking for, then look no further. Primely positioned in the Arcadia Estate close to a variety of schools, shops, parklands and only minutes from the M1 freeway access.
Insights: 14A Bridge Road, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Looking for a low maintenance lifestyle?
Located in the ever popular Arena Estate, within close proximity to parkland, the shopping centre, schools, walking tracks, access to the M1 freeway and all the other amazing amenities the estate has to offer. This double story beauty will suit those looking for a low maintenance lifestyle without sacrificing space inside the home
Offering:
* 3 great sized bedrooms, the master having a walk in robe and ensuite, plus your own balcony
* The remaining bedrooms all have built in robes
* The family bathroom services the other bedrooms
* 2 living areas include a formal lounge room and a large open plan meals area & family room
* Impressive kitchen features a large island bench, brand new stainless steel 900mm oven, 900mm gas cooktop, rangehood, dishwasher and stone bench tops
* Guest powder room on the lower floor
* Creature comforts include ducted heating and evaporative cooling
* Double garage with remote control door and internal access
* Quality fixtures and fittings
* Landscaped gardens
This home is ready for you now!
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Description:
Vacant Land - Ready to Build on!
One of the last remaining titled allotments in Grandvue, located on the prestigious north side of Officer, this is a special parcel of land. A generous 448sqm, this block offers the perfect opportunity to build your dream home and start your new life in Officer. A short stroll from a range of schools, cafes and parks, this is a central location ideal for family living. Close to St Brigid's Catholic Primary School, Officer Primary School, Beaconsfield Primary School, Maranatha Junior School, St Francis Xavier College, Arena Shopping Centre & Beaconsfield shopping village. Short distance to Monash Freeway and easy access to Princes Highway.

Description:
BUILD YOUR DREAM ON SKYLINE!
Situated in the prestigious Grandvue Estate of Officer, this approx. 1027m2 vacant block of land has the perfect potential to build your dream home!
The large, elevated block, surrounded by beautiful brand new homes, offers million dollar views of the rolling hills in the distance, and could be such a great place to raise your family here, or just to enjoy the serene life this place has to offer.
One of the last remaining blocks which is flat enough to run a driveway to the rear of the property, which also provides flexibility when constructing a home.
Having the advantages of being close to multiple shopping centres, local private and government schools, close to the town centre, Cardinia train station and easy access to freeways, this is an opportunity not to be missed!
Call Mandeep now on 0433 591 561 to make an offer before it's sold!

Description:
Near New Family Home, Immaculately Presented. Two Living Areas!
Located in the Potters Grove estate is this near new & immaculately presented family home. Offering modern & neutral toning's throughout, this home is further complimented by:
* Four great sized bedrooms. Oversized master bedrooms offers a WIR and a private ensuite. Remaining bedrooms offer BIR's plus share a further bathroom.
* Two separated & spacious living areas.
* Impressive kitchen that features stone bench tops, overhead & under bench cupboards & modern s/s appliances.
* Undercover alfresco entertaining area.
* Being a corner block there is rear access to the backyard with double gates from the side plus a spacious backyard.
This stunning home is further completed by high ceilings, gas ducted heating, timber look laminate flooring, high quality security doors, stone tops to bathroom & laundry, high grade plantation shutters, LED down lights, internal garage access & so much more to be found on inspection.

Postcode Perfect Amazing Value!
• Low Care Offering Easy Comfortable Living
• Parks Play Relax & Lifestyle
• Great Home Design & Comfort
This perfectly positioned home offers great value with 3 bedrooms, the massive master with ensuite & walk in robe, bedroom 2 & 3 has built in robes, additional bathroom offers maximum convenience.
Open plan living along with meals zone, connects the modern and kitchen with ample storage, dishwasher, stainless trim appliances incl oven gas cooker & dishwasher.
Highlights-
• Perfect presentation
• Split System Air Conditioning
• Ducted Gas Heating
• Double remote garage

Convenient location that captures modern living perfectly, walk to the Arena & Lakeside Place enjoy the array of cafes, eateries, Woolworths & specialty retailers, easy reach too schools, parks and the train station is a very easy to stroll.
With the Cardinia Rd rail crossing bypass currently being constructed prices are set to soar in this part of town.
A great home, appealing color scheme & finish, the option for the new owner to move in and make it home or allow the current tenants stay on with a new lease and you enjoy the benefits of a ready made investment the current tenants come highly regarded and praised by the vendor.
Opportunity is knocking!

Description:
Perfect Family Living Inside and Out!
Perfectly situated in the popular Cherrington Estate built by the famous Franklin homes, this breathtaking family designed home is sophisticated on the outside, contemporary and open plan living on the inside and boasts a stunning kitchen with stone benches, quality stainless steel appliances, ample cupboard space and a beautiful view overlooking the meals/dining area.
The homes impressive interior comprises 4 generous sized bedrooms, master with walk in robe & en suite, undercover outdoor entertaining area and can be transformed to display multiple living areas. Plenty of room to move around with stunning open plan living and the flexibility to design your own homes interior. This complete package also includes, ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, double garage, roller blinds throughout, beautiful tiles for easy maintenance, carpets in bedrooms and a tiled kitchen splash-back. All this and more located within 400m walking distance to the station and schools all in close proximity!
Perfectly suited for investors or first home buyers, situated in a family focused neighborhood will love and appreciate location, lifestyle and convenience at its finest.

Description:
Every Buyer Wants Arena!
• Low Care High Impact
• Parks Virtually at Your Door
• Arena Estate that has it all
Neat and extremely sweet is how we describe this appealing home, open plan living space with adjoining meals along with a modern kitchen with stone bench tops, glass splash back, near new dishwasher, 900ml electric oven & separate gas cooktop and ample storage that is so on trend and exciting.
With 3 bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite, built in robes in bedrooms 2 & 3, separate bathroom, toilet and laundry.
Entertain and relax in comfort with the alfresco complete with top of the range ‘eco wood’ decking no staining or paint required and the feel is brilliant it really is superb and mergers with the home creating a wonderful space, set up casual lounges, outdoor kitchen, dining and watch all your favorite sport with space for an outdoor screen.
The easy care but impressive landscaped grounds with auto irrigation are presentation perfect and add to the natural energy of relaxing in this great home.
Highlights-
• Timber look hard wearing floors
• Feature timber wall
• 9ft ceiling height
• Immaculate presentation in and out
• Split System air conditioner
• Gas ducted heating
• Double remote garage with internal access
Super convenient location that captures everything that living in Arena offers perfectly, big ovals and sporting grounds opposite, walk to the Arena Shopping Centre-cafes, eateries, Woolworths, walk to the adjacent public and private schools, parks, wetlands, and the Cardinia Rd train station is very easy to access.
With the Cardinia Rd over rail crossing committed and started we can expect prices to soar in this part of town.
A lovely home, superb location, and wow this property is offering incredible value!

UpHill Real Estate proudly presenting superbly designed Luxury park facing Townhome with balcony and two living areas in highly desired Kaduna Park.

- Master Bedroom with ensuite
- Open Plan dining & living
- Powder Room
- Laundry
- Modern Kitchen with stainless steel 600mm Cooktop & Oven

- Separate living area with park facing balcony

This home also comes with
- Ducted heating

- Cardinia train station

Description:
A Home Designed For The Modern Family!
This well built and well-designed home in Officers Arcadia estate is sure to appeal to a variety of buyers with something for the whole family to enjoy.
Offering three good sized bedrooms including master bedroom with walk in robe plus ensuite with double vanity. Bedroom two features a walk in robe whilst the third bedroom has a built in robe.
The kitchen features Caesar stone bench tops, 900mm upright stainless steel oven with cook top, rangehood and dishwasher plus butlers pantry, this overlooks the generous sized living and dining area. A secondary living zone is located off the kitchen area, its the perfect area for a kids play room or TV area. The home also offers a study at the front for all your business needs.
Other internal features of this home include ducted heating throughout, split system air conditioner, internal access from the double car garage on remote, multiple ceiling fans throughout the home, internal laundry plus quality fixtures and fittings throughout.
Enjoy the afternoon sun with a lovely undercover outdoor area with deck. Its a great spot for a BBQ and entertaining family and friends. A small grassed area is perfect for kids and pets play. All this is located on a 479m2 block of land (approx.).
This well presented and well maintained family home is a great location close to the M1 Freeway, Shopping centre, Officer Club and walking tracks is sure to go quickly so don't miss your opportunity to view! Call today to book an inspection or see you at the next open home.
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

You wont want to miss out on an opportunity like this. For more information including plans please call Matt on 0417 411 883 or Samantha on 0478 178 618.

Description:
1 Year Young Home in the Savannah Estate
This modern and stylish home fantastically situated in the highly sought-after Savannah Estate, is sure to tick all the boxes for first or second home buyers and investors alike. Offering a great floor plan that allows for easy living, the home consists of four spacious bedrooms plus a study, a large living and dining zone, two bathrooms and a double car lock up garage. Furthermore, the home features stainless steel appliances in the kitchen, stone benchtops throughout, an open plan kitchen, dining and lounge area, ducted heating and split system cooling. The front and backyard have been fully landscaped and are very low maintenance, perfect families and entertaining. The location is second to none, being conveniently located within close proximity to shops, freeway access, public transport and great schools contact Jack on 0468 958 463 to register your interest!

Description:
A CLEAR STANDOUT ARENA'S FINEST!
Grand, stylish and elegance epitomises the feeling you immediately get when you step inside this exquisite family home. From its imposing entrance hall to all the lux finishes throughout, this stunning Metricon built home is an absolute stand out, a class above and is sure to impress anyone looking for nothing but the very best!
DOWNSTAIRS
Beautiful entrance hall with formal lounge / sitting room
Stylishly appointed kitchen featuring quality stainless steel appliances & stone bench tops
Open plan meals & family rooms
Rumpus / Games room
Laundry & Powder room
Timber bi fold doors opening out to the impressive alfresco area
Double garage with additional workshop area
UPSTAIRS
4 Spacious bedrooms all featuring walk in robes Master suite complete with full ensuite & balcony
Additional kids retreat living area
Separate Bathroom & Toilet
ADDITIONAL FEATURES
5KW Solar power system
In ground swimming pool
Ducted refrigerated heating & cooling
Gas ducted heating
Alarm & CCTV
External shutters to the North & West facing windows
Situated in the vibrant Arena estate Officer, this home is perfectly located within walking distance to Arena Plaza, St Francis Xavier College, St Clare's Primary, public transport as well as quick easy access to the M1 Freeway.

Description:
STRIKING MODERN TOWNHOUSE
Located in the highly regarded Arena development on the crown of the hill and flanked by a wonderful tree studded park, this contemporary residence reflects the best in low maintenance and convenience orientated living. With ease of access to highway/freeway and major shopping; living here is sure to be hassle free.
The home boasts two levels including open planned living area extending to a large decked courtyard, perfect for outdoor entertaining. The kitchen is central to this area and equipped with stainless steel appliances. Upstairs three bedrooms and a study area are complimented by family and ensuite bathrooms. A double garage with direct internal access is both safe and secure whilst refrigerated air conditioning throughout maintains a comfortable environment year around.
An affordable start to your real estate journey, sound investment prospect or a downsizer for position conscious buyers.

Description:
One the whole family can enjoy!
This contemporary family home offers instant appeal with its modern façade, inviting interior and its fantastic location. Situated in Arcadia Estate in Officer which is highly desired for its affordability and family friendly environment.
Step inside this modern beauty and make your way to the heart of the home where the sun-drenched open plan kitchen awaits, complete with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, overhead cabinetry and breakfast bar adjoining to the spacious living, meals area then the covered outside pergola area.
This well-designed home accommodates four generous sized bedrooms and two separate living zones. The master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite. The additional three bedrooms both have built in robes and are conveniently serviced by the functional main bathroom and separate toilet.
Additional extras include; ducted heating, split system cooling, separate laundry, double remote-control garage with internal and external access, low maintenance gardens to the front and back all positioned on a 414m2 approx. allotment.
If location is what matters to you, then look no further set close to shops, public transport, easy freeway access, choice of schools and much more all minutes away from your front door step. Whether youre an investor, first home buyer or looking for a change, this home is sure to tick all the right boxes!
